body:
**Learn more about United Kingdom Security Vetting**

To learn more about the UK security vetting, you can follow the link below.

 [About security](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/security-vetting-and-clearance)

components.html: You must wear your pass and make certain it is visible at all times when inside 102 Petty France and Clive House.

heading: Security Pass application
lede: Please use this online form to apply for a security pass. This will grant you access to the building of Ministry of Justice at 102 Petty France and Clive House. Remember to remove your pass when you leave the building - you must not wear your pass outside even for short periods.
